title: DocChase
subtitle: How we designed and developed  a communication platform for healthcare providers with fast, responsive, and secure user interface.

about.name: DocChase
about.desc: DocChase aims to streamline patient management, appointment scheduling, and communication for healthcare providers. Its primary goal is to enhance operational efficiency and provide a user-friendly interface for managing various healthcare workflows, including call logs, notifications, and reports.

projectTeam.desc: The project’s initial development took 3-4 months (July to November), with ongoing development planned afterward.

problem.title: What was the Problem?
problem.heading: Client Challenges
description: Need for a user-friendly interface to ensure adoption among staff.
Complexity in managing and streamlining asynchronous tasks like follow-ups with doctors, collecting patient records, finding doctor information, and notifications.
Currently, multiple software and tools are used for different tasks, making the process difficult to manage and time-consuming.

goal.title: What was the Goal?
description: Centralized Dashboard: Provide a comprehensive overview of appointments, tasks, and notifications.
Task Automation: Automate repetitive tasks like follow-ups, notifications, and appointment reminders.
Seamless Communication: Integrate call logs and messaging features using Twilio and Telnyx.
Efficient Scheduling: Enable intuitive scheduling and calendar views for managing appointments.
Data Security: Implement robust authentication and authorization using JWT.

solution.title: What was the Solution?
description: Dashboard: Built an interactive dashboard displaying key metrics, task overviews, and upcoming appointments.
Calendar Integration: Integrated a dynamic calendar to schedule and track appointments seamlessly.
Patient Management: Developed a dedicated patient page for storing and updating patient data.
Call Log System: Implemented a chronological call log feature with playback functionality for recorded calls using Twilio.

Fax and Call Functionality: Successfully integrated Telnyx to provide calling and faxing capabilities. Overcame significant challenges related to API integration and optimized the system for real-time communication.
Task Automation: Used Node-Cron for scheduling and managing tasks like notifications and follow-up reminders.
PDF Generation: Leveraged PDFKit to create custom reports and exportable documents for patient records.
Secure Authentication: Integrated JWT for secure session management and user authentication.
Data Visualization: Used libraries like Chart.js for visualizing data and reports in the dashboard.

targetAudience.healthcareProviders: Efficiently manage patient data, schedule appointments, and communicate seamlessly.
targetAudience.administrativeStaff: Streamline operations with an intuitive dashboard, calendar integration, and task automation.

understandingCurrentWorkflow.understandingUserJourney: We analyzed the entire user journey by conducting detailed interviews with the client to understand the process thoroughly.
understandingCurrentWorkflow.developingUserFlow: Using the insights from the interviews, we created a user flow and grouped features based on the specific tasks users needed to complete.
understandingCurrentWorkflow.visualisingFeaturesAndDataPoints: Each feature was aligned with user goals, and we brainstormed multiple ways to present these features to make the process simpler and more user-friendly.

designChallenges: Developing user flow understanding due to the complexity of the process, which was difficult to grasp all at once.
developmentChallenges: Integration of multiple third-party APIs (Twilio, Telnyx, Axios).
Ensuring the system handles concurrent tasks without performance issues.
Designing a flexible database schema to accommodate varied patient data.

Big Challenge: Integration of advanced calling and fax functionalities using Telnyx. This required adapting to Telnyx's API for seamless communication features while maintaining system performance and ensuring a cohesive user experience.

userInterfaceAndProductOutlook.designApproach: We designed the user interface with a clean, simple look using white, gray, and blue colors, which give the app a healthcare feel. The easy-to-read sans-serif font and clear charts make the information simple to understand.

results.performance: Fast and responsive user interface with minimal load times.
results.scalability: Scalable backend design to accommodate future feature additions.
results.security: Robust implementation of secure APIs and data handling practices.

description.achievement: The project successfully delivered a centralized platform that addressed the client’s challenges.

metricsAchieved.performance: Fast and responsive user interface with minimal load times.
metricsAchieved.scalability: Scalable backend design to accommodate future feature additions.
metricsAchieved.security: Robust implementation of secure APIs and data handling practices.
